title: Boarding Gate.rmvb
description:
empty shells of human beings inhabit assayas\&#039; industrial nightmare in a more coherent, quick and modest version of \"demonlover\".

the plot is surprisingly intricate and well tied up, but it\&#039;s hanging in the background which might confuse some viewers.

while anti-heroes are driving and shooting with fake determination, body language plays a big part and action scenes look like the awkward mess that the characters are made of.

it\&#039;s the modern take on antonioni\&#039;s emptiness theme with guns and flesh.

ultimately, morally bankrupt ruthless manipulators fall victims to their hearts.
